summary: If You have a Sleeping bag in the basement of Proudspire, Jordis room is bugged. This is a text file with instructions that walk you through the 2 simple console commands needed to activate the room and remove a crate that is left in the wrong spot.
descriptionHtml:
If You have a Sleeping bag / bed roll in the basement of Proudspire, Jordis room is bugged. This is a text file with instructions that walks you through the 2 steps needed to activate the room and remove a crate that is left in the wrong spot. Nothing more - Nothing less.

2 simple easy to use Console commands. 

After downloading this file it will be found wherever you store your downloaded mods.. You will need to unzip it and double click on the enclosed text file.

Please endorse this if you use it. That is the best way for others to see that it works.

Other files by Ohio Gramps
____________________

author: Ohiogramps
